languages.text: "Система водоснабжения покоев Лорд-капитана была осквернена вливанием нецелевой жидкости. Необходимо таинство переосвящения".

traits.locale_text: "Система водоснабжения покоев Лорд-капитана была осквернена вливанием нецелевой жидкости. Необходимо таинство переосвящения".

languages.text: "The water supply system in the Lord Captain's quarters has been desecrated by the infusion of undesignated fluid. A sacrament of reconsecration is required."
languages.original_text: "Система водоснабжения покоев Лорд-капитана была осквернена вливанием нецелевой жидкости. Необходимо таинство переосвящения".

traits.locale_text: "The water supply system in the Lord Captain's quarters has been desecrated by the infusion of undesignated fluid. A sacrament of reconsecration is required."
"The water supply system in the Lord Captain's quarters has been desecrated by the infusion of undesignated fluid. A sacrament of reconsecration is required."
"The water supply system in the Lord Captain's quarters has been desecrated by the infusion of undesignated fluid. A sacrament of reconsecration is required."
"The water supply system in the Lord Captain's quarters has been desecrated by the infusion of undesignated fluid. A sacrament of reconsecration is required."
"The water supply system in the Lord Captain's quarters has been desecrated by the infusion of undesignated fluid. A sacrament of reconsecration is required."

languages.text: “舰长大人房间的供水系统遭到了不知名液体的污染，需要重新实施圣化圣礼。”
languages.original_text: "The water supply system in the Lord Captain's quarters has been desecrated by the infusion of undesignated fluid. A sacrament of reconsecration is required."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人房间的供水系统遭到了不知名液体的污染，需要重新实施圣化圣礼。”

languages.text: «El suministro de agua de los aposentos {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán ha sido profanado por la introducción de un fluido indeterminado. Es preciso llevar a cabo un sacramento de reconsagración».
languages.original_text: "The water supply system in the Lord Captain's quarters has been desecrated by the infusion of undesignated fluid. A sacrament of reconsecration is required."

traits.locale_text: «El suministro de agua de los aposentos {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán ha sido profanado por la introducción de un fluido indeterminado. Es preciso llevar a cabo un sacramento de reconsagración».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテンの部屋の給水システムが、指定されていない液体の注入によって冒涜されました。再聖変化の聖餐式が必要です」
languages.original_text: "The water supply system in the Lord Captain's quarters has been desecrated by the infusion of undesignated fluid. A sacrament of reconsecration is required."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテンの部屋の給水システムが、指定されていない液体の注入によって冒涜されました。再聖変化の聖餐式が必要です」

languages.text: "Die Wasserversorgung im Quartier des Lord Captains wurde durch die Einleitung einer unbestimmten Flüssigkeit entweiht. Wir brauchen ein Sakrament der Neuweihe."
languages.original_text: "The water supply system in the Lord Captain's quarters has been desecrated by the infusion of undesignated fluid. A sacrament of reconsecration is required."

traits.locale_text: "Die Wasserversorgung im Quartier des Lord Captains wurde durch die Einleitung einer unbestimmten Flüssigkeit entweiht. Wir brauchen ein Sakrament der Neuweihe."

languages.text: « Le réseau d'alimentation en eau desservant les quartiers {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneur-capitaine} a été profané par l'injection d'un fluide inapproprié. Il nous faut renouveler le sacrement de consécration. »
languages.original_text: "The water supply system in the Lord Captain's quarters has been desecrated by the infusion of undesignated fluid. A sacrament of reconsecration is required."

traits.locale_text: « Le réseau d'alimentation en eau desservant les quartiers {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneur-capitaine} a été profané par l'injection d'un fluide inapproprié. Il nous faut renouveler le sacrement de consécration. »

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan'ın odasındaki su temini sistemi, belirsiz bir sıvının aktarılması neticesinde kirletildi. Bir yeniden kutsama töreni yapılması gerekli."
languages.original_text: "The water supply system in the Lord Captain's quarters has been desecrated by the infusion of undesignated fluid. A sacrament of reconsecration is required."
